description: Tetris® Effect: Connected offers a visually and aurally dynamic reinvention of the classic puzzle game, integrating music, backgrounds, and effects that synchronize with gameplay across over 30 stages and 10 modes. This indie title enhances the experience with a robust multiplayer expansion, featuring cross-platform competitive and cooperative modes playable locally and online, including "CONNECTED" for boss battles, "Zone Battle" with a time-stopping mechanic, and "Score Attack" variations. A unique "Zone" mechanic allows players to pause falling pieces for strategic advantage or to gain bonus rewards. Spectator mode supports up to eight participants per match. Technical enhancements include uncapped framerate, ultra-wide monitor support, and 4K resolution capabilities, alongside expanded graphical options for both 2D and VR play.

Hades is a god-like rogue-like dungeon crawler blending fast-paced action, rich atmosphere, and character-driven storytelling from the creators of Bastion, Transistor, and Pyre. As the immortal Prince of the Underworld, players wield the powers and mythic weapons of Olympus in an attempt to escape the god of the dead, growing stronger and uncovering the story with each unique attempt. The game features extensive interaction with Olympians like Zeus and Athena, offering dozens of powerful Boons to enhance abilities and thousands of viable character builds. A fully-voiced cast of characters provides unique story events and relationship development within the Underworld's dysfunctional family. Built for replayability, the ever-shifting Underworld presents new surprises and persistent bosses, with permanent upgrades through the Mirror of Night aiding subsequent escape attempts. Incorporating elements of Action, Indie, and RPG genres, Hades delivers exciting combat and a gripping narrative with spectacular hand-painted environments and an original score.

Grand Theft Auto III is a critically acclaimed action game, often described as a sprawling crime epic that redefined open-world gameplay. Set in Liberty City, it immerses players in a dark, intriguing, and ruthless criminal underworld. The game features a massive, diverse open world, a wide array of characters, and the freedom to explore extensively. Its revolutionary open-world mechanics, stellar voice acting, a darkly comic storyline, and a stunning soundtrack have established it as a defining title within the genre for a generation.

Grand Theft Auto: Vice City is an action game set in the 1980s, chronicling the rise of Tommy Vercetti within the criminal underworld. Vice City is depicted as a vast, vibrant, and diverse urban environment, from its beaches to swamps, and its glitzy areas to ghettos, offering a detailed digital city experience. The game combines open-world exploration with a narrative-driven story, where players arrive in a city of both allure and corruption with the opportunity to seize control. Tommy Vercetti, recently released from prison, is sent to Vice City by his boss, Sonny Forelli, only to be betrayed and left without resources. Facing opposition from biker gangs, Cuban gangsters, and corrupt politicians, and with most of the city against him, Vercetti's path involves fighting back and asserting dominance over Vice City.

Galactic Civilizations II: Ultimate Edition is an indie strategy game that encompasses the complete Galactic Civilizations II saga, including Galactic Civilizations II: Dread Lords, the Dark Avatar expansion, and the Twilight of the Arnor expansion. Players assume the role of a civilization leader in a hostile galaxy, balancing economic, technological, diplomatic, cultural, and military power to achieve galactic domination through various victory paths. The game features a single-player experience with procedurally generated maps or a multi-mission campaign, and includes expanded gameplay elements such as asteroid belts, unique planets, espionage, new diplomatic treaties, and an enhanced artificial intelligence. The edition also introduces Terror Stars, civilization-specific technology trees, map and scenario editors, new ship types, and planetary improvements, all visualized with a 3D engine for planets, stars, asteroids, and ship battles, with custom ship creation capabilities. The game supports online competition via the Metaverse and is fully moddable.

Street Fighter® IV is an action fighting game that revisits the series' origins by combining the classic moves and techniques of Street Fighter® II with advanced next-generation technology. This virtual martial arts experience features a roster of 25 fighters, including beloved characters like Ryu, Ken, Chun-Li, and Guile, alongside new combatants such as Crimson Viper, Abel, El Fuerte, and Rufus. The game presents stylized 3D environments and characters, played from a traditional 2D perspective with 3D camera flourishes. Six-button controls return, incorporating new special moves like Focus Attacks, Super Combos, and Ultra Combos. New gameplay elements cater to both novice and expert players of this competitive fighting genre. The PC version offers unique visual shaders: Watercolor, Poster, and Sumi-E ink styles.

FEZ is an indie adventure game where players control Gomez, initially a 2D creature in a 2D world, who embarks on a journey across time and space upon discovering a mysterious third dimension. The core gameplay involves navigating 3D structures by switching between four distinct classic 2D perspectives. This indie title encourages exploration of a serene, open-ended world filled with secrets, puzzles, and hidden treasures, prompting players to unearth past mysteries and contemplate the nature of reality and perception by changing their viewpoint.

Quake is a dark fantasy first-person shooter developed by id Software, inspiring retro-style FPS games. The enhanced version offers an authentic, updated experience with support for up to 4K resolution, widescreen display, enhanced models, dynamic lighting, anti-aliasing, depth of field, and an atmospheric soundtrack by Trent Reznor. Players assume the role of Ranger, utilizing a powerful arsenal to battle corrupted knights, ogres, and various creatures across four dimensions, including military bases, medieval castles, lava dungeons, and gothic cathedrals, in a quest to collect four magic runes to defeat an ancient evil threatening humanity. The game includes original expansion packs like "The Scourge of Armagon" and "Dissolution of Eternity," alongside MachineGames' expansions "Dimension of the Past" and "Dimension of the Machine," which involves confronting threats within a core of lava and steel. Quake features Horde Mode for solo or multiplayer combat against endless monster waves, online and local co-op play for the campaign and expansions with up to 4 players, and competitive multiplayer matches for up to 8 players online or 4 players in local split-screen. Crossplay is supported across PC, Xbox, PlayStation, and Nintendo Switch. Players can choose between the original, fully-moddable Quake or the enhanced version with visual improvements and expanded multiplayer. The game also offers free mods and missions, with more planned, and supports dedicated server and peer-to-peer connectivity for online matches. This action-focused title emphasizes combat, exploration, and survival.

DARK SOULS™ II, an action RPG developed by FROM SOFTWARE, serves as the highly anticipated sequel to the acclaimed 2011 title. This installment continues the franchise's legacy of providing an old-school action RPG experience characterized by immense challenge and significant emotional reward, captivating players globally. The game introduces gameplay innovations for both single and multiplayer modes, featuring a dark journey filled with overwhelming enemy encounters and diabolical hazards. Players can expect intense combat within a vast world powered by a new engine that enhances graphics, sound, and visual effects, alongside mind-bending environments populated by twisted monsters and formidable bosses. The experience is designed to assault the senses, preying on human phobias through elements like auditory hallucinations and vertigo. Furthermore, DARK SOULS™ II offers deeper customization for weapons and armor, an evolved multiplayer system for improved online cooperative and competitive play, and refined gameplay mechanics including fluid motion-capture animations, an upgraded combat system, an expanded cast of characters, new abilities, and a balanced player progression.

DARK SOULS™ II, an action RPG developed by FROM SOFTWARE, serves as the highly anticipated sequel to the acclaimed 2011 title. This installment continues the franchise's legacy of providing an old-school action RPG experience characterized by immense challenge and significant emotional reward, captivating players globally. The game introduces gameplay innovations for both single and multiplayer modes, featuring a dark journey filled with overwhelming enemy encounters and diabolical hazards. Players can expect intense combat within a vast world powered by a new engine that enhances graphics, sound, and visual effects, alongside mind-bending environments populated by twisted monsters and formidable bosses. The experience is designed to assault the senses, preying on human phobias through elements like auditory hallucinations and vertigo. Furthermore, DARK SOULS™ II offers deeper customization for weapons and armor, an evolved multiplayer system for improved online cooperative and competitive play, and refined gameplay mechanics including fluid motion-capture animations, an upgraded combat system, an expanded cast of characters, new abilities, and a balanced player progression.

Undertale is an indie RPG where players control a human who falls into the underground world of monsters and must find a way out or remain trapped. The game features a unique battle system that allows for negotiation and avoiding combat, alongside timed attacks for extra damage and dodging enemy projectiles in a top-down shooter style. It is characterized by original art, a soundtrack with personality, and a soulful, character-rich story emphasizing humor, developed predominantly by a single individual. Players can befriend bosses and engage with numerous characters, including a skeleton. A warning is included regarding imagery potentially harmful to those with photosensitive epilepsy.

Team Fortress 2 is a free-to-play action game featuring nine distinct classes, each offering a unique range of tactical abilities and personalities suited to various player skills. This popular online title receives continuous free updates, introducing new game modes such as Capture the Flag, Control Point, Payload, Arena, and King of the Hill, alongside maps and equipment. Players can customize their characters with hundreds of collectible, craftable, buyable, and tradable items, including weapons and cosmetic hats, to match their gameplay style and personal taste. Training and offline practice modes are available to help players hone their skills before engaging in multiplayer combat.

Dragon Age: Origins - Ultimate Edition is a critically acclaimed RPG where players assume the role of a Grey Warden, tasked with uniting shattered lands and defeating an ancient foe amidst civil war. The gameplay involves exploring a visually rich world, making significant moral decisions, and engaging in intense combat against formidable creatures. The narrative expands with the Awakening expansion, where players become commander of the Grey Wardens, facing new challenges, acquiring skills and spells, and venturing into the region of Amaranthine. This comprehensive edition also includes nine additional content packs, offering further rewards, party members, and deeper immersion into the Dragon Age storyline.

Sid Meier's Civilization® V is a flagship turn-based strategy game where players lead a civilization from its origins to the space age, engaging in warfare, diplomacy, technological discovery, and empire building against historical leaders. The game features an intuitive interface suitable for both new players and veterans, a believable world with ultra-realistic graphics and lush landscapes, and extensive community and multiplayer options including LAN matches and in-game mod installation. New features include a hex-based gameplay grid for strategic combat and city-building, City States as diplomatic resources, and an improved diplomacy system with interactive leaders. The game is compatible with a wide range of systems and supports player-created content such as maps, scenarios, and interfaces. The genre is strategy, and specific language versions are available for Mac and Linux + SteamOS.

Into the Breach is an indie strategy simulation game where players control futuristic mechs to defend humanity from an alien threat. The game features turn-based combat with procedurally generated challenges, requiring tactical analysis and counter-strategies as all enemy attacks are telegraphed. Players build ultimate mechs by acquiring new weapons and pilots, defending civilian infrastructure that powers their units. Failure results in sending aid through time to an alternate timeline, offering another chance to succeed in this role-playing experience.

Sid Meier's Civilization V is a turn-based strategy game where players establish and lead a civilization from its origins to the space age, engaging in warfare, diplomacy, technological discovery, and empire building against historical leaders. The game features an intuitive interface suitable for both new players and veterans, realistic graphics showcasing explorable landscapes, and extensive community and multiplayer options allowing global or local competition, game modding through an in-game hub, and compatibility across various systems. New features include a hex-based gameplay grid enabling strategic combat and building, City-States as diplomatic resources, and an enhanced diplomacy system for negotiations with interactive leaders. Players can also create, discover, and download community-generated content such as maps, scenarios, and interfaces.
